displayAboutMessage() - Static method in class courierServices.Runner.MenuDisplayMethods
 
displayCustomerDetails() - Method in class courierServices.baseClasses.Customer
Displays customer details: ID, CitizenID, Name, Address, Phone, E-mail ID, list of orders (IDs).
displayCustomerOrderIDs(long) - Method in class courierServices.ContainerClasses.Customers
Displays all orders (IDs) for given customer, It compares passed customer ID with all customer IDs, and then calls PrintOrder function of Customer class to print all orders.
displayCustomerPortal() - Static method in class courierServices.Runner.MenuDisplayMethods

displayMyDetails(long) - Method in class courierServices.ContainerClasses.Customers
Displays All details of given customer.
displayOrderDetails() - Method in class courierServices.baseClasses.Order
Displays Order details: Order ID, Customer ID, Order Description, Source Location, Destination, Tracked location, weight, cost of delivery, is_delivered flag
displayOrderDetails(long, long) - Method in class courierServices.ContainerClasses.Orders
